signals.problem_statement: The customer spends a lot of time sorting through emails, which is inefficient for their small team.
signals.customer_ask: They want a solution that can help them be more efficient without being as complex as Salesforce.

signals.problem_statement: The customer has issues with tracking missing stock and damaged goods using a Google spreadsheet, which is time-consuming.
signals.customer_ask: They want a system that can assign ticket numbers and track these issues more effectively.

signals.problem_statement: The customer experienced a significant email loss due to a staff member deleting emails instead of responding.
signals.customer_ask: They need a solution that ensures no emails are missed, even when staff are away.

signals.problem_statement: The customer does not have any reporting or analytics on their email management, leading to a lack of visibility on email status.
signals.customer_ask: They want to track how many emails are open, pending, or closed.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a simple solution that non-technical staff can use without extensive training.
signals.customer_ask: They require a user-friendly interface that their team can easily adopt.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about managing personal emails of staff members while ensuring their own emails remain private.
signals.customer_ask: They want to set up a hierarchy where they can manage staff members' personal inboxes without exposing their own.

signals.problem_statement: The customer currently lacks integration with social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram for managing messages.
signals.customer_ask: They want to connect with Instagram messages, which is important for their business.
